text: Ronnie Dean Coleman (born March 13, 1964) is a retired American professional bodybuilder and former police officer. He is widely regarded as one of the greatest bodybuilders of all time. Coleman won the prestigious Mr. Olympia title a record-breaking eight times consecutively from 1998 to 2005. Category:1964 births Category:African-American players of American football Category:American bodybuilders Category:American police officers Category:Living people
title: Ronnie Coleman
